title: My Prayer wear
summary: Adds smartwatch support to My PrayerMy Prayer must be installed on the device
description: My Prayer wear is only for smartwatches running Android Wear. It needs My Prayer app version 2.1 or above on the device to work, and is compatible with Android 4.3 or above.To install My Prayer:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.haz.prayerUser Instructions:1- My Prayer app must be installed on the phone to use the smartwatch app.2- When running the watch app for the first time, you must connect the phone, then launch My Prayer app to send data to the watch app. Retry if it doesn’t work.3- All My Prayer settings will apply on the smartwatch app.4- Smartwatch app settings can be changed from My Prayer app.5- All notifications will come from My Prayer app on the phone, not the app on the watch.Our Page:https://plus.google.com/107646861985526422926/postsOur Email:azure.droid.contact@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
My Prayer wear is only for smartwatches running Android Wear. It needs My Prayer app version 2.1 or above on the device to work, and is compatible with Android 4.3 or above.

To install My Prayer:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.haz.prayer

User Instructions:

1- My Prayer app must be installed on the phone to use the smartwatch app.

2- When running the watch app for the first time, you must connect the phone, then launch My Prayer app to send data to the watch app. Retry if it doesn’t work.

3- All My Prayer settings will apply on the smartwatch app.

4- Smartwatch app settings can be changed from My Prayer app.

5- All notifications will come from My Prayer app on the phone, not the app on the watch.


Our Page:
https://plus.google.com/107646861985526422926/posts

Our Email:
azure.droid.contact@gmail.com
comments: Great application, I use Samsung S3 now but it not supported.  Can you develop one support this watch (S3) it will be highly appreciated by any one use this type of watch Thanks
Would have been great if it provided support for tizen wearable like Samsung gear
Helps me keep track of my prayer time even when I'm working, thank God
When we'll have compilations for Android Wear 2.0 !?
